menuItems.title: Grits and Shrimp
menuItems.description: The dish that started it all. Creamy, stone-ground grits taking center stage, topped with succulent, seasoned shrimp in a savory southern sauce.

testimonials.quote: The harmony of flavors in that Grits and Shrimp hits all the right notes. A true soulful performance.
I know good food, and this is IT. I'd book 'With Love, Twin' for every event if I could!
The soul in this food is as deep as the music I play. A taste of home, elevated.
That ain't just food, that's a whole mood. Twin's cooking is no joke!
